snippet.title: Creeper World 2 Trailer
snippet.description: Creeper World 2:  The sequel to the innovative and award winning Creeper World game that changed the strategy genre forever.  CW2 yet again pushes the boundaries of strategy and defense games.  Gravity, fields, missiles, repulsor beams, micro-rifts, anti-creeper that you control... these are just a few of the things you will find in this rockin adventure.  Lean more at the CW2 home; http://knucklecracker.com
